entry.title: Writing a New Post
entry.summary: Naming and Path Create a new file named YYYY-MM-DD-TITLE.EXTENSION and put it in the _post/ of the root directory. Please note that the EXTENSION must be one of md and markdown. From v2.4.1, you can create sub-directories under _posts/ to categorize posts. Front Matter Basically, you need to fill the Front Matter as below at the top of the post: --- title: TITLE date: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS +/...
